name: Elena Vaenga
description: '''Yelena Vladimirovna Khrulyova'''{{Family name footnote|Vladimirovna|Khrulyova|lang=Eastern Slavic}} (born 27 January 1977), better known by the [[stage name]] '''Elena Vaenga''' ({{langx|ru|link=no|Елена Ваенга}}), is a popular Russian singer, songwriter and actress. Her style of singing is [[author song]], [[folk rock]], [[Russian chanson|chanson]] and others. Vaenga's repertoire includes her own compositions, traditional ballads and folk songs, and songs derived from classical Russian poems. In 2025, she was awarded as a [[Merited Artist of the Russian Federation]].
